title: MD
biography: The 2025 World Blitz Chess Championship was the 27th World Blitz Chess Championship held by FIDE to determine the world champion in chess played under blitz time controls. Since 2012, FIDE has held the World Rapid and Blitz Championships at a joint tournament. The tournament was held in Doha, Qatar, from 29 to 30 December 2025.
aiSummary: Ibrahim Janahi is a pediatric pulmonology specialist with an H-index of 18 at Sidra Medicine (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Journal of Environmental Science and Public Health, QScience Connect. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
